author: Nick Nairn
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Roll the pastry out into a very thin rectangle and dust with the cocoa and icing sugar. Roll up the pastry from both ends until they meet in the centre. Slice into 1cm/Â½in slices and place onto a baking sheet. Place into the oven and bake for 5-6 minutes, or until risen and cooked through. To serve, place onto a plate, dust with cocoa and drizzle with honey.
ingredients: 55g/2oz ready-rolled puff pastry,  icing sugar, to dust,  cocoa powder, to dust,  honey, to drizzle
